body.p: When the proportion of the equity held by non‑controlling interests changes, an entity shall adjust the carrying amounts of the controlling and non‑controlling interests to reflect the changes in their relative interests in the subsidiary. The entity shall recognise directly in equity any difference between the amount by which the non‑controlling interests are adjusted and the fair value of the consideration paid or received, and attribute it to the owners of the parent.
